subject: Don't miss this unique chance
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
No matter how expensive the drugs you buy on the Web are they still can be fake. Top Canadian Web pharmacy CanadianPharmacy offers you a wide choice of GENERIC medications at really low prices. If you're looking for cheap high-quality medications, visit CanadianPharmacy right now.
CanadianPharmacy 100% safety at the lowest price you've ever seen. Only generic drugs on sale.
Best regards,Carson Calhoun
